DOC.brief_summary: This trial is a 2 x 2 factorial design, double-blinded, randomized controlled trial to evaluate efficacy and safety of remote ischemic preconditioning and postconditioning in patient undergoing coronary angioplasty.
DOC.brief_title: Single-cycle Remote Ischemic Preconditioning and Postconditioning (SCRIP) Trial
DOC.criteria: Eligible for percutaneous coronary intervention (elective and emergency cases) Age > 18yearold Informed consent Previous CABG Previous PCI in 1 week / treatment with thrombolysis within 30 days Peripheral arterial disease / AV shunt of upper extremities (AVF for hemodialysis) Paresis of upper limb Unstable patient such as cardiogenic shock / vasopressor / IABP / cooling (hypothermia) Fatal cardiac arrhythmia (VT / VF) Chronic hypoxia
